title: Christmas pudding
description: Get motivated in November to make your Christmas pudding to have it mature in time for Christmas.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 1.2 litre/2 pint pudding basin, baking paper, foil and kitchen string.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz pitted ready-to-eat prunes, chopped or left whole
100g/3½oz frozen butter, grated, plus a little extra for greasing
100g/3½oz chopped glacé cherries (or left whole if you prefer)
